rayTracer.title: Ray Tracer
rayTracer.description: Simulates the behavior of light on 3D objects to create realistic rendering.
rayTracer.presentation: Group project during my second year of computer science studies. Java application implementing fundamental computer graphics and ray tracing principles to generate realistic lighting scenes.
rayTracer.imageAlt: Realistic rendering of a reflective sphere
objectif: Develop a 3D rendering engine based on ray tracing
Replicate physical interactions of light with surfaces
Generate images with shadows, reflections, and refractions
Apply advanced math concepts in 3D graphics

tech.mathMethods: Math: linear algebra, vectors, intersection algorithms

features: Handling of diffuse and specular lighting
Support for spheres, planes, triangles, etc.

architecture.description: Key components: ray, scene, camera, materials, rendering engine.

ray.title: Ray
ray.description: Defines a ray with origin and direction

scene.title: Scene
scene.description: Contains all objects and light sources

rayTracer.challenges: Optimizing intersection calculations and ensuring physically accurate light simulation while maintaining performance.
rayTracer.future: Add texture mapping, optimize with spatial structures, create a full graphical interface.

apiBoardGame.imageCaption: User interface of API Board Game
objectif: Design a complete, secure REST API

features: Quick search by name or category
Display full list of available games

model.title: Model
model.description: Handles business logic and data access

apiBoardGame.challenges: Securing the API while maintaining user experience, validating input, and managing error handling.
